TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlParameterWriter extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter

summary.span: 编写使用 HTTP 实现的 Web 服务的传出请求参数，参数的名称/值对编码到 URL 请求字符串中，而不是编码为 SOAP 消息。

span.span: Writes out-going request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP with name-value pairs encoded in the URL's query string rather than as a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的其他类通过 HTTP GET 和 http POST 操作支持 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读取器分别在参数或返回 Web 方法的对象和 HTTP 请求或响应流之间进行序列化和反序列化。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读取器使用 HTTP 进行传输, 但不使用 SOAP 标准交换消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类提供了一个客户端方法, 用于将参数名称/值对编码为 HTTP 请求 URL 的查询字符串。 The class provides a client-side method, , to encode parameters name/value pairs into an HTTP request URL's query string. `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`例如, 在 URL 中, `a`和`b`是参数名称, `1`并且和`2`是其值。For example, in the URL `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`, `a` and `b` are parameter names, and `1` and `2` are their values. 通常不需要直接使用 。You typically will not need to use directly. 相反, 当 wsdl.exe 工具根据 HTTP GET 实现生成客户端代理代码时, 它将应用于每个 Web 方法, 并将该特性的属性设置为。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET implementation, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetRequestUrl (string url, object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetRequestUrl(string url, object[] parameters) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetRequestUrl (url As String, parameters As Object()) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetRequestUrl(System::String ^ url, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要添加到 URL 中的 Web 方法参数值（如果需要）。

span.span: The Web method parameter values to be added to the URL, if necessary.

summary.span: 将 Web 方法的参数值写入 HTTP 请求的查询字符串。

span.span: Writes Web method parameter values to the query string of an HTTP request.

returns.span: 包含查询字符串和参数值的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the query string and the parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将参数名称/值对编码到 HTTP 请求 URL 的查询字符串中。The method encodes parameters name/value pairs into an HTTP request URL's query string. `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`例如, 在 URL 中, `a`和`b`是参数名称, `1`并且和`2`是其值。For example, in the URL `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`, `a` and `b` are parameter names, and `1` and `2` are their values. 返回一个具有任何编码参数的新 URL 字符串。A new URL string, with any encoded parameters, is returned.
